name: PricebookEntry
description: Represents an entry in a price book that lists the price of a product.
summary:
In Salesforce, the **PricebookEntry** object represents an association between a product and a price book, facilitating the management of product pricing within the system. Here are the key attributes of the **PricebookEntry** object:

1. **Id (id)**: A unique identifier for the PricebookEntry record.
2. **Name (string)**: The name of the PricebookEntry.
3. **Pricebook2Id (reference)**: A reference to the associated Pricebook2 (price book).
4. **Product2Id (reference)**: A reference to the associated Product2 (product).
5. **UnitPrice (currency)**: The price of the product in the context of the price book.
6. **IsActive (boolean)**: Indicates whether the PricebookEntry is active.
7. **UseStandardPrice (boolean)**: Indicates whether the PricebookEntry uses the standard price from the product record.
8. **CreatedDate (datetime)**: The date and time when the PricebookEntry was created.
9. **CreatedById (reference)**: A reference to the user who created the PricebookEntry.
10. **LastModifiedDate (datetime)**: The date and time when the PricebookEntry was last modified.
11. **LastModifiedById (reference)**: A reference to the user who last modified the PricebookEntry.
12. **SystemModstamp (datetime)**: The date and time when the PricebookEntry was last modified by the system.
13. **ProductCode (string)**: The code associated with the product.
14. **IsDeleted (boolean)**: Indicates whether the PricebookEntry has been deleted.
15. **IsArchived (boolean)**: Indicates whether the PricebookEntry has been archived.

These attributes help manage the link between products and their prices within different price books, enabling businesses to handle pricing strategies effectively in Salesforce.
label: Price Book Entry
